body_html: @ebrevdo: could you please help reopen linear? I am trying to execute the code provided here by Alex (https://github.com/atpaino/deep-text-corrector), but I keep getting this error message: AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.python.ops.rnn_cell' has no attribute '_linear'.

body: @ebrevdo: could you please help reopen linear? I am trying to execute the code provided here by Alex (https://github.com/atpaino/deep-text-corrector), but I keep getting this error message: AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.python.ops.rnn_cell' has no attribute '_linear'.
